summary: Allows you to bundle together 24 arrows together so they actually sell for less than a gold each.
descriptionHtml:
This mod allows you to bundle together 24 Iron, Falmer, Forsworn or Ancient Nord arrows together to sell for 6, 8, 8 or 10 gold(base value) respectively. Since these don't normally sell for anything(since Skyrim doesn't have support for selling things for less than a gold) this allows you to actually make money off of usually worthless items.

You craft the arrows together at the tanning rack and it shouldn't give you any smiting experience, beware you can still shoot them for 1 damage so don't use this to transport arrows only use it to sell them. You can also uncraft the bundle from a tanning rack. It should be compatible with anything and everything, balanced and run like a brick.

If you think that they sell for too little or anything just tell me, its easy to change the values.
author: Braneman
